questions.question_text:
You are designing forms for a company that has a new Dynamics 365 Sales implementation.
Three departments need specific fields on the main form so they do not have to fill out multiple forms.
Each person should see only the fields they need.
//IMG//

You need to ensure that the forms open correctly, display only the fields needed, and that data can be entered quickly.
How should you design the form?

choices.C: Edit an out-of-the box form. Add extra fields. Give all departments security roles for that form.
choices.A: Create three forms for all departments. Add all the fields. Add field-level security to fields not needed for each group.
choices.D: Create one form for each department. Add only fields needed on the form for each department. Assign the appropriate security role to each form.
choices.B: Create one form for each department. Add all fields needed for all departments. Use business rules to hide fields.
